mapper.select: SELECT language_key as languageKey ,CASE WHEN 'kr' = #{lang} THEN language_kr WHEN 'en' = #{lang} THEN language_en WHEN 'ja' = #{lang} THEN language_ja WHEN 'zh_cn' = #{lang} THEN language_zh_cn WHEN 'zh_tw' = #{lang} THEN language_zh_tw END conversionLanguage FROM language_message WHERE use_flag = 'Y'
